original_text: For every one shall be salted with fire, and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt.
korean_text: 사람마다 불로써 소금 치듯 함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: For every one shall be salted with fire
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람은 불로 맛을 보게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 제물은 소금으로 맛을 보게 될 것이다
